titles.title: Electing certain minority members to certain standing committees.
Electing certain minority members to certain standing committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects a named minority Member to the House Committees on: (1) Agriculture; (2) Homeland Security; and (3) Transportation and Infrastructure.
